data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of West Khasi Hills access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of West Khasi Hills.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 4,219 believers living in West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Koch (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Koch (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Koch (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of West Khasi Hills unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, teach the church in the county of West Khasi Hills to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of West Khasi Hills, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: West Khasi Hills
location.people_groups_list: Halam, Bonaj, Sabar, Bhunar, Hajang Banai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Halam (42,000), Bonaj (400), Sabar (3,900), Bhunar (200), Hajang Banai (4,900)
